error_404.main: This not be a page we got available matey.

index.in_progress_statement: This'ere portfolio be a work in progress, so if ya be lookin' around as a tech-savvy person, take a look at the code for the real interestin' stuff.

index.long_title: Times to be reachin' out to me for meetings and stuff

3d_models_index.object_description_microRoom: Tiny rooms! They be fittin' in the little one story buildings well.
3d_models_index.object_description_balcony: This be my home's upper deck, me wifey wanted to know if the red thingy she was looking at on amazon would fit.
3d_models_index.object_description_house: Arr, this be me ship.. err... house I made! Be leavin' the tree spots and land elevation stuff off, but she be pretty detailed still
